If you're looking for an experienced all-star Power Host who can give you a seamless and enjoyable car-sharing experience from start to finish, then our small family-owned fleet is perfect for you!

Land at the AVL airport, and immediately start enjoying your stress-free vacation or business trip. We‚Äôve personally selected a variety of safe, affordable, and reliable vehicles that are constantly tested and professionally maintained. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the curvy mountain roads of North Carolina!

Don‚Äôt take our word for it. Read our reviews to rent with confidence!

Why rent from us?
‚≠êÔ∏è We're open 24/7/365. Land at 2am, fly out at 5am? We've got you covered!
‚≠êÔ∏è Consistent 5-star reviews
‚≠êÔ∏è Washed, cleaned, and sanitized vehicles - GUARANTEED!
‚≠êÔ∏è Professionally maintained and regularly serviced vehicles
‚≠êÔ∏è Optional UNLIMITED mileage
‚≠êÔ∏è Contactless key exchange for EASY pick-up and drop-off

We look forward to hosting your trip!

- Jacob & Aubrey

Hello! I am Jaren and I am one of the largest Power Hosts in the world! My other Turo business is in Fort Myers, FL:
Island Rides: 
https://turo.com/us/en/drivers/2456231

Over 7,750 5-star trips from 2017-2022! 
Fell in love with Asheville and now doing it all over again! One of the most experienced hosts in the world and want you to feel comfortable renting with our new venture, Mountain Rides!

We found the high season for Asheville is the low season for Florida (hurricane season) and we transport cars back and forth, and also have cars specifically for the Asheville market. 

We only rent through Turo, as they provide our insurance. Feel free to check out our website for available cars in the Asheville market and to contact us with any questions!
www.MountainRides.rent
@MountainRides.rent

No cancellations or refunds once the trip starts. Sorry.

Shane & Mariah Creech, the dynamic duo behind SMC Adventures, are passionate entrepreneurs and outdoor enthusiasts dedicated to transforming ordinary adventures into extraordinary experiences. Born with a love for nature and a zest for life, the couple decided to channel their shared enthusiasm into a venture that would redefine outdoor escapades.

Shane, an avid adventurer with a background in outdoor education, brings a wealth of expertise in creating thrilling yet safe experiences in the great outdoors. His infectious enthusiasm and commitment to responsible exploration have earned him recognition among outdoor communities.

Mariah, on the other hand, is a creative force with a keen eye for crafting unique and memorable experiences. With a background in event management and hospitality, she adds a touch of sophistication to the adventures, ensuring that every detail is meticulously planned to create an elevated and immersive journey for guests.

Together, Shane and Mariah founded SMC Adventures with the mission of offering more than just outdoor activities ‚Äì they aspire to provide a holistic adventure experience that combines excitement, comfort, and a strong connection with nature. Their fun-loving approach and genuine passion for the outdoors make SMC Adventures a haven for those seeking a blend of thrill and relaxation in the natural world.

Whether it's navigating challenging terrain, camping under the stars, or simply enjoying a sunset picnic with loved ones, Shane and Mariah's vision is to cultivate a community of adventure seekers who share their appreciation for the beauty of the outdoors. SMC Adventures is not just a business for them; it's a manifestation of their belief that life's greatest moments are found in the heart of nature, and everyone deserves a chance to experience it in its fullest, most exhilarating form.
